episodes.title: All Hail Chairman Bob: The REVCOM Story -Chapter 1: A Red Sun in the Sky
episodes.description:
If you've been to a protest, you've likely seen a bunch of people in black shirts emblazoned with REVOLUTION on them. They try to take over and are rather disruptive. But who are these people? They are the Revolutionary Communist Party or REVCOM and they have a long history on the left....
=======================================================
Support the Channel on Patreon! The full series is Available now for $20!
https://www.patreon.com/c/Buonapartista?utm_medium=unknown&utm_source=join_link&utm_campaign=creatorshare_creator&utm_content=copyLink

All our links here: https://linktr.ee/buonapartista
================================================================
CITATIONS

episodes.title: Fear and Loathing in the International Socialist Organization: Chapter 6, The Aftermath
episodes.description:
In 2019, the aftershocks of the International Socialist Organization's collapse were still discussed amongst the  American left but quickly faded into the background. This begs the question, where did the members and more importantly the former leaders go after the fact?
================
linktr.ee/buonapartista

episodes.title: Fear and Loathing in the International Socialist Organization: Chapter 5, The Collapse
episodes.description:
After the "Comrade Daniel" affair, the International Socialist Organization had a steady decline, exacerbated by the Rise of Bernie Sanders and more moderate socialists. Despite this, they limped along until 2019, when something else was found to have been swept under the rug by the Steering Committee....
================
linktr.ee/buonapartista

episodes.title: Fear and Loathing in the International Socialist Organization: Chapter 4, The Renewal Faction
episodes.description:
After 30 years of existence, leading members of the International Socialist Organization started to leave the group. They cited poor and unchanging leadership, which brought on a political opportunity for an internal opposition group to form....
================
linktr.ee/buonapartista

episodes.title: The FBI Cracks down on Socialists #history #iso
episodes.description: Despite all the good and honest activism, the International Socialist Organization did, sometimes they inadvertently drew attention from the federal government

episodes.title: Fear and Loathing in the International Socialist Organization: Chapter 2, The Growth
episodes.description:
By the early 90's the words Socialist and Communist on made people only think of failure. But despite the odds, the International Socialist Organization proceeded to grow into the largest radical socialist group in the country. This wasn't without some controversy though.....
================
linktr.ee/buonapartista

episodes.description: Barbara Winslow, a famed Feminist Scholar and activist describes her time inside the infamous International Socialist Organization

episodes.title: Fear and Loathing in the International Socialist Organization: Chapter 1, The Origins
episodes.description:
In 2019, the largest Marxist political organization collapsed. But how did that happen? In this first episode of a six-part series, see how the International Socialist Organization (ISO) formed in the early 80's and built the foundations for what was once the largest Radical Socialist group in the United States.
================
linktr.ee/buonapartista
